messages.title: My priorities
messages.content: The prosperity of Edinburgh South relies on strong links to Europe and the rest of the UK. With even more cuts coming from the SNP and Tory Governments we need to stay in both the UK and the EU to keep our economy strong. The Scottish Liberal Democrats are the only party opposing a hard Brexit and Independence.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are a pro UK Party and oppose the SNP's plan for a second independence referendum. We took the lead in the campaign against independence across large parts of Scotland at the last referendum. The SNP have taken their eye off the ball and should focus on running Scotland.

Theresa May and the Conservatives are pursuing a destructive hard Brexit agenda which will have a serious impact on the British economy. The Liberal Democrats are a pro Europe Party. We believe that Britain is better off in Europe. We will give the British people the final say on any Brexit deal.

We know that education is the chance for every person to get on in life. We will invest in Scottish education from nursery to colleges. Scottish education used to be the best in the world. Now it is slipping down in the international rankings and is just average. We want the Scottish Government to focus on education instead of its campaign for independence.

Mental health in Scotland needs urgent investment. Young people still wait up to a year for treatment. The SNP delayed their mental health strategy for 15 months and it still doesn't go far enough. Our plan to put 1p on dividend income tax in Scotland will raise tens of millions that can get extra mental health staff into GP services, A&E and schools.

issues.brexitEurope: The Scottish Liberal Democrats are the only party opposing a hard Brexit and Independence. We believe that Britain is better off in Europe. We will give the British people the final say on any Brexit deal.
